params._cdhNft: Contract Address for TOWER Battle Cards Inventory contract
params._randomNumberSigner: Random Number sender wallet for signing message
params._towerInventory: Contract Address for TOWER Treasury Inventory contract

generateCardId(bytes32,uint8,uint256,uin.details: Returns the random cardId generated for specific card index using the random base seed for the ticket type

params._baseSeed: Base seed for generating the card ID.
params._counter: Card index for the ticket redemption.

returns._0: randomly generated Card ID for token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeemTicket(uint8,uint256,bytes).details: Meta Transactions are processed for this open() method.      On opening chest/s, transfer the chest token from owner's wallet to blackhole contract for locking the token.      `BaseSeed` is generated with `_generateBaseSeed()` method and other random seed for pool and rarity selection      is also generated based on that base seed, to ensure high accuracy random values and signature.      Methods in pools are called through this method for getting Card Ids from each data pool of each category.

params._sig: Random Number signature generated from backend for random seed
params._ticketType: this defines how many number of opener card will be there

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newBlackHoleAddress: Address of new BlackHole Address or burner Address

setRandomNumberSigner(address).details: This is the trusted setup for generating random number and signing the value through the wallet.

params._newSigner: New Random Number sender wallet, for signing message

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: NFTRedemption has multiple parameters while deployment

redeemTicket(uint8,uint256,bytes).notice: Main method for opening chest, this has provision of handling multiple chests at once. Random number signature         is passed for base random seed.

setBlackHoleAddress(address).notice: Address that acts as burner for tokens that will be burnt in polygon network

setRandomNumberSigner(address).notice: Set wallet address used for generating random number and sign from backend
